activities: FlightStats, Inc. offers a variety of data and information services to the travel and transportation industries.  Some of these online services require the collection of minimal amounts of personal contact information from EU travelers and their travel agencies and airlines.  This data is used primarily for the monitoring of traveler itineraries and the sending of messages to these travelers.  On-line viewing of this personal data is accessible only to the traveler, their travel agency, their airline, or travel entity under secure access and is not shared or transmitted to other parties.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: We are not a member of any other safe harbor privacy programs
recoursemech: The Council of Better Business Bureaus’ (BBB) EU Safe  Harbor Dispute Resolution Procedure
